column4: dvi nvidia card + cheap dell flat panel vga = washed out color.  does anyone know how to make nvidia cards not do this?  i believe this is a very common problem but i can't find a simple solution :'(
it's sooo bad, nvidia driver thinks my monitor is a television so like, the text on github is impossible to read lol
Bleah I'm on a 640x480 res now because X and nvidia think that's a good thing
yea my experience with nvidia+linux has been, like if you don't have quality monitors and hardware, you're in for a world of hurt
